alert.note: Alert for Grant (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 12 at 1:32AM MDT until further notice by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Aberdeen SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Dakota... South Fork Whetstone River near Milbank affecting Grant County. .The following river forecasts include forecast precipitation through the next 24 hours. Any additional future precipitation could affect the forecasts. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...South Fork Whetstone River near Milbank. * WHEN...From early this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 1113.0 feet, Water reaches the bottom of the bridge on 148th Street. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 1113.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:15 AM CDT Wednesday was 1113.4 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 1113.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr. The next statement will be issued Thursday.
